content: TEL AVIV California-based Avery Dennison  has agreed to buy Hanita Coatings from the Hanita kibbutz and the Tene investment fund for $75 million  the Calcalist financial news website said on Sunday.
name: Avery Dennison Corporation
title: Avery Dennison to buy Israel's Hanita Coatings: report

content: TEL AVIV  Sept 4 California-based Avery Dennison  has agreed to buy Hanita Coatings from the Hanita kibbutz and the Tene investment fund for $75 million  the Calcalist financial news website said on Sunday.
name: Avery Dennison Corporation
title: Avery Dennison to buy Israel's Hanita Coatings -report
